type DocumentDesigner = class inherit ScrollableControlDesigner interface IRootDesigner interface IDesigner interface IDisposable interface IToolboxUser

summary.span: 设计器基类，用于扩展支持嵌套控件并应接收滚动消息的 的设计模式行为，并为其提供根级别设计模式视图。

span.span: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of, and providing a root-level design mode view for, a that supports nested controls and should receive scroll messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此设计器为根设计器，这意味着，它提供了根级别设计模式视图关联的文档在设计模式下查看时。This designer is a root designer, meaning that it provides the root-level design mode view for the associated document when it is viewed in design mode. 你可以将一个设计器关联类型使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清洗向上非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 指示设计器是否支持指定的工具。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.

span.span: if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持一种工具，则它将启用工具箱中这是在设计器接收到焦点。If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer receives focus. 否则，它将被禁用。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 后一种工具被标记为启用或禁用它不再次查询。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it can not be queried again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户双击工具箱项时调用。 is called when the user double-clicks on a toolbox item. 文档设计器应创建指定的工具的组件。The document designer should create a component for the specified tool. 在工具箱中启用的工具将传递给此方法。Only tools that are enabled in the toolbox will be passed to this method.
